授業目的: This course introduces students to the history and current state of Japanese food culture with reference to both the domestic and international contexts.
到達目標: Students will gain a broad understanding of Japan's food culture in the past and present as well as the theoretical perspectives commonly employed by scholars in the field.

トピック.授業計画1: A wide range of topics related to Japanese food culture will be selected to reflect student interest as well as current scholarly research.
トピック.授業外学習2: Weekly readings, topics for short essays, and prompts for presentations will be announced in class.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 授業外学修課題／Assignment, homework required outside class (06)
成績評価Grading2: プレゼンテーション・発表／Presentation (07)
成績評価Grading3: 授業への参加度（自発性、積極性、主体性、等）／In-class participation,contribution (09)
